org.jetel.component.xml

Class SAXHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.dom4j.io.SAXContentHandler
        • org.jetel.component.xml.SAXHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.DeclHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler

    public class SAXHandler
extends org.dom4j.io.SAXContentHandler
    SAX Handler that will dispatch the elements to the different ports. NOTE: almost hard copy from XMLExtract's inner class - has to be re-developed!!!
